projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Some projects come from work and others are in my free time

about.title: About me
about.description:
Young 16-year-old Freelance developer and student in STI2D, I am passionate about programming, astronomy and creating unique user experiences.

Curious and creative, I like to design innovative solutions, explore new technologies and perfect interfaces to make them intuitive and engaging.
Always motivated by learning and continuous improvement, I seek to combine technique and creativity to offer projects that are both functional and inspiring.
